channel.title: First date
channel.description: Hi, so... there's this girl I like in my class, I asked her out so that we can do something on tuesday, I was thinking of a movie but then my friend told me that never go to movies on a first date because then you will be sitting there couple of hours watching a movie and being quiet instead of talking with the other person. I haven't told her what we're going to do, I just said I'll pick you up and we'll do something. I'm desperate for ideas :o, thank you. Oh and I'm 14, so don't suggest anything impossible.

item.title: First date
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Is that so? When did that declare Fag.

Read full topic

item.title: First date
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

exe626:

Exe gaves his date a flower yesterday, does that make him a fag?

No, but talking in third person does.

Read full topic

item.title: First date
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_kyle pk3r kyle
item.description:
@pk3r_kyle wrote:

[quote=“Speakerboxxx, post:68, topic:139227”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=191209.msg1725354#msg1725354 date=1188758672]

Go to the park and bring some drinks or some shit to smoke , then after you’re drunk or high its much easier to talk to eachother.

OR do the same thing but in your house (parents must be out of house ofcourse).

Ice skating and other shit would be kinda awkward.

40 year old virgin.
[/quote]
Lmao, … meh, i wont even bother.

I smoke and i drink, so what?
I bet you even gave flowers on your first date you fag.[/quote]

pfft, so what if he did, better than gettin laid by the monkey u call a 1st date

Read full topic

item.title: First date
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Good, keep it that way. You’ll probably be better off. Go to the park and surprise her with a picnic. Set it up and have somebody watch over it, tell the person watching over it to hide when you 2 show up.

item.title: First date
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:55, topic:139227”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=191209.msg1724660#msg1724660 date=1188729635]
Star’s is probably the best. Ice skating/rollerblading is fun, provided you don’t suck at it.
[/quote]
I think it’d actually be more fun if they both sucked.
That way it’d break the awkwardness and they can laugh together whilst learning.

Then they can go again and skate together.

Happily ever after.[/quote]
Good point. I suck at ice skating, so I’ll keep that one in mind. Haha.

Read full topic
